response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. The product is valued at $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to our mutual interests.

To make this acquisition even more enticing, I propose a transaction price of $900,000. This offer not only provides you with significant savings but also ensures a partnership based on mutual value and respect.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your financial considerations and strategic needs. I am here to discuss any further details or concerns you might have.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
